Query: causes of left ventricular hypertrophy 
Passage: Right ventricular hypertrophy. Description, Causes and Risk Factors: Abbreviation: RVH. Right ventricular hypertrophy is the increase or the enlargement in the size of the right ventricle of the heart. The right ventricle is responsible for pumping blood towards the lungs. There are several possible causes of right ventricular hypertrophy.
